means: 继续存在的，未死的，依然健在的
幸存，活下来( survive的现在分词 )
比…活得长，经历…之后还存在

sentence.Network_en: He described the difficulties of surviving for four months as a captive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他描述了被俘4个月里挣扎求生的艰难岁月。

sentence.Network_en: The chances of a planet surviving a supernova always looked terribly slim.
sentence.Network_cn: 行星躲过超新星爆发的几率总是十分渺茫。

sentence.Network_en: Viruses tend to be good at surviving when a computer system crashes.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算机病毒在系统崩溃后往往依然存在。

女性的天职是生存（survival）和繁殖（replication）。为了达到目标，她会投向任何可以帮助她生存与繁殖的人。
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... surveillance 临视；看守 survival 幸存，生存 supersized 超大型的.

entry.def: If a person or living thing survives in a dangerous situation such as an accident or an illness, they do not die.

example.ex: ...the sequence of events that left the eight pupils battling to survive in icy seas for over four hours...
example.tran: 致使这 8 个小学生在冰冷的海水里挣扎求生四个多小时的一连串事件

example.ex: Those organisms that are most suited to the environment will be those that will survive...
example.tran: 最适宜该环境的微生物将会存活下来。

entry.def: If you survive in difficult circumstances, you manage to live or continue in spite of them and do not let them affect you very much.

example.ex: On my first day here I thought, 'Ooh, how will I survive?'
example.tran: 我第一天到这儿时就想，“天哪，我怎么能挺过去呢?”

example.ex: ...people who are struggling to survive without jobs...

entry.def: If something survives, it continues to exist even after being in a dangerous situation or existing for a long time.

example.ex: When the market economy is introduced, many factories will not survive...
example.tran: 引入市场经济后，许多工厂将面临倒闭。

example.ex: The chances of a planet surviving a supernova always looked terribly slim.
example.tran: 行星躲过超新星爆发的几率总是十分渺茫。

entry.def: If you survive someone, you continue to live after they have died.

example.ex: Most women will survive their spouses...
example.tran: 大多数女性都比配偶长寿。

example.ex: She is survived by two daughters from her first marriage.
example.tran: 她身后留下了头婚时生的两个女儿。

sentences.sentence: "the Wollemi pine found in Australia is a surviving specimen of a conifer thought to have been long extinct and therefore known as a living fossil"
"the only surviving frontier blockhouse in Pennsylvania"
